sx360::FileSetup

sx360::FileSetup Struct Reference

#include <sxcommon.h>

List of all members.


Public Attributes
int  cards
OPEN_MODE  mode
int  columnsPerCard

This structure defines how a file will be opened and the parameters with which it will be opened. 

Member Data Documentation

int sx360::FileSetup::cards

Number of cards per record.

OPEN_MODE sx360::FileSetup::mode

How the file should be opened. Must be one of READ_ONLY, READ_WRITE, or CREATE

int sx360::FileSetup::columnsPerCard

The number of columns in each card. For the standard 360 column binary, this is 80.
